text: Does anyone have any luck/experience embedding an HTML richtext property in an email and have it render? something like `{{ personalization_token('contact.alert_text', 'text') }}`  where alert_text is rich text looking something like this : `<ul><li>One</li><li>Two</li></ul>`? I’ve tried everything I can think of, so any insight would be greatly appreciated.
I looks like no richtext fields on my are being render. Is it possible that being in a sandbox is affecting this? Or maybe that its a custom object I’m pulling the property from?
It seems like the issue is with custom objects, I can render the same rich text fields in an email if they are a contact property, not sure if this is a bug or not.
